long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Define words and phrases that you don't know with a single click, and then add them to Kichi as flashcards to review later!

Simply highlight any text on the page, right-click, and select "Kichi."

The words are also defined in context. For example, "let" will give different explanations for "let me", "let down", and "let go".

This extension requires an active Kichi account. For more on Kichi, visit https://kichi.io
